```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(gganimate)
library(ggthemes)
library(transformr)

shp = places("dc", class = "sf")

dc2017 <- dc %>%
  sample_n(200)

```

```{r}
dc_locations <- st_as_sf(dc2017, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)

ggplot(data = shp) +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = dc_locations, aes(size = numshots, fill = numshots)) +
  labs(title = "Gunfire Incidents in DC between 2006 and 2017",
       subtitle = "Year: {round(frame_time)}", 
       caption = "Source: ShotSpotter Data" ) +
  
  # added x and y axis labels
  
  xlab("Longitude") + 
  ylab("Latitude") +
  
  # added the map and minimualist tufte themes that I like. 
  
  theme_map() +
  theme_fivethirtyeight() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 8)) +
  
  # gganimated the graph to progressively show the arrests by date
  transition_time(year)
```
